verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, in my <S%H7879>complaint<s%>: <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>.
Hide <S%H5641><s%> me from the secret <S%H5475>counsel<s%> of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>, From the <S%H7285>tumult<s%> of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>;
Who have <S%H8150>whet<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> like a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, And have <S%H1869>aimed<s%> their <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, even <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>,
That they may <S%H3384>shoot<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> places at the <S%H8535>perfect<s%>: <S%H6597>Suddenly<s%> do they <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at <S%H3372>him<s%>, and fear not.

They <S%H2388>encourage<s%> themselves in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>purpose<s%>; They <S%H5608>commune<s%> of <S%H2934>laying<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%> <S%H2934>privily<s%>; They <S%H559>say<s%>, Who will see <S%H7200>them<s%>?

They search <S%H2664>out<s%> <S%H5766>iniquities<s%>; We have <S%H8552>accomplished<s%>, say <S%H2664>they<s%>, a diligent <S%H2665>search<s%>: And the <S%H7130>inward<s%> thought and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of every <S%H376>one<s%> is <S%H6013>deep<s%>.
But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at <S%H2671>them<s%>; With an arrow <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> shall they be <S%H4347>wounded<s%>.
So they shall be made to <S%H3782>stumble<s%>, their own <S%H3956>tongue<s%> being against <S%H7200>them<s%>: All that see them shall wag the <S%H5074>head<s%>.
And all <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H3372>fear<s%>; And they shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, And shall wisely <S%H7919>consider<s%> of his <S%H4639>doing<s%>.

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and shall take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3477>him<s%>; And all the upright in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>.
